name: create_booking_post
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST : https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking

header: 
  "Content-Type":"application/json"
  "User-Agent":"PostmanRuntime/7.29.0"
  "Accept":"*/*"
  "Cache-Control":"no-cache"
  "Postman-Token":"ac675ca3-eb3d-4f7d-afe1-173c7f1add72"
  "Host":"restful-booker.herokuapp.com"
  "Accept-Encoding":"gzip, deflate, br"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"
  "Content-Length":"250"

body: 
  {
    "firstname" : "Dimon",
    "lastname" : "Spirl",
    "totalprice" : 111,
    "depositpaid" : true,
    "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2022-01-01",
        "checkout" : "2023-01-01"
    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}

Response:

Code: 200 Status: OK 

   
 
  header:   
  "Server":"Cowboy"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"
  "X-Powered-By":"Express"
  "Content-Type":"application/json; charset=utf-8"
  "Content-Length":"199"
  "Etag":"W/\"c7-Dt9X289FbI5o9Si+PP/COdSKCbk\""
  "Date":"Thu, 10 Aug 2023 19:53:05 GMT"
  "Via":"1.1 vegur"  
 		 
  
    
 
  body:   
  {
  "bookingid":1077,
  "booking":{
    "firstname":"Dimon",
    "lastname":"Spirl",
    "totalprice":111,
    "depositpaid":true,
    "bookingdates":{
      "checkin":"2022-01-01",
      "checkout":"2023-01-01"
    },
    "additionalneeds":"Breakfast"
  }
}
